title: Sketchbook Folio, "The Marriage of Henry IV", 1812–23
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over traces of black chalk on white laid paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at lower margin: 36 Rubens Parigi
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: On clouds, at upper section of drawing, royal couple in guise of Jupiter and Juno are married by Hymen. Below, chariot with female figure wearing mural crown representing the City of Lyons.
